General.Name: Citylabs Co.Ltd
General.Description: CITYLABS Co.,LTD. engages in building and maintaining intelligent information management systems in roads, aviation and ports, and smart city sectors in South Korea. It offers intelligent transportation, aviation information management, maritime traffic control, and disaster safety management systems; and smart city and environment solutions. The company was formerly known as DAYLI BlockChain Co.,LTD. and changed its name to CITYLABS Co.,LTD. in January 2021. CITYLABS Co.,LTD. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Anyang, South Korea.
